text: Nabo bishura bati:- ewe Lutwi (iii), twebwe turi intumwa z’Umuremyi wawe, abo bantu ntibazo gushikira, nawe nugende hamwe n’abantu bawe kugeza hagati y’ijoro, kandi umwe muri mwebwe ntahindukire inyuma atari umutambukanyi wawe gusa, nawe azoshikirwa n’ingorane zizoshikira abo bandi bantu, mu vy’ukuri isango ryabo ni mugitondo, mbega aho mugitondo si hafi cane
